name: drumroll
description:
A music puzzle game where you program drum tracks using dice.

Note: Must be played on Chromium-based browsers due to multi-threading. Sound is required. For best results, close unnecessary programs.
 You're a newly hired drum programmer, but before you can do your job, you have a few rhythms to learn. Instructors will teach you how to program beats in using the Drumroll DAW, and after that, you're on your own. Embark on an exciting music puzzle game in drumroll!

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022
